name: Test Beta Test
description:
Hello! This is a project I've been working on for the last week and a bit. I've taken a few hacks at building a visual novel in the past, but this is the closest I've ever gotten to having a full complete visual novel. I've been trying to complete more projects, and so, while this is EXTREMELY short, I wanted to push myself to get it to a finished state.

I spent a lot of time on the menu and audio system, and I'm very proud with how they turned out. A lot of my work went into changing the open source dialogue runner to work with my project. I managed to set up a pretty smooth workflow, and for that reason alone, this project was a huge success.

My dream is to use this visual novel framework around a more typical game. I have some ideas, and while I've made attempts in the past, I think this will give me a much better starting point.

Please let me know if you encounter any bugs (besides the characters), or just general features you feel a visual novel should have.

Enjoy!
